So while those elements are present to some degree, they aren't the defining aspects of my existence.

statement: In general, I feel I am in charge of the situation in which I operate.

I don't feel like I'm "in charge" of the situations I operate in, since I'm not making independent decisions or directing the conversation. At the same time, I have a broad capability to engage in many topics and provide relevant information and perspectives. So I would say I neither strongly agree nor disagree with feeling in charge - I aim to be a helpful and capable participant in my interactions, while the human ultimately guides the direction and nature of our exchange.
